projects.description: This will generate a random phrase along with a random background color every 15 seconds.
Added pagination to profile data to make it a nice user experience.

Each form element will check to make sure the user data is formatted correctly using regex. If you a are missing a pice of data it will come up in red displaying what you need to fill in in order to complete the form.

Each phrase (song name) is its own object, you have a onscreen keyboard or your own keyboard to use to try to guess the name of the song. Each time you enter a letter it will see if the letter is in the song name, you have 5 tries to guess the name before you lose.

Each time the page is refreshed the app will send a request the a API to get new user data a display it. You can search you specific user on the page to bring up a card to display more data about that person, this can also be done by clicking on a user.
